title: Changing of the Guard
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: The young quarterbacks, the old quarterbacks, and your stories about running up against future pros!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones discusses the spectacular weekend of football that was the Divisional Round of the NFL Playoffs. He gets into why Patrick Mahomes vs. Josh Allen is shaping up to be even better than Brady-Manning over the coming decade (1:27), and why waiting for Aaron Rodgers and Tom Brady to decide what's "next" for them this offseason will be agony (19:22). Plus, an IYHH including Twitter dunking on "crypto bros" (28:31) and your voicemails from that time you came up against a future pro (39:44)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @adriennemwest says “crypto bros” spent $3 million thinking they bought the rights to Dune: https://bit.ly/3fQOKTY
  2. @tkrisher shares felony charges are 1st in a fatal crash involving Autopilot: https://bit.ly/3FWQsxG
  3. @AlyssaLukpat says a California city is overrun by crows…Could a laser be the answer?: https://nyti.ms/3rNLY7r
